select LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: UPDATE of_donate SET serialId=#serialId#, contributorId=#contributorId#, peerId=#peerId#, type=#type#, payAmount=#payAmount#, payTime=#payTime#, accountStatus=#accountStatus#, feedbackContent=#feedbackContent#, feedbackTime=#feedbackTime#, feedbacker=#feedbacker#, remark=#remark#, contributorId=#contributorId#, modifyTime = now() WHERE donateId = #donateId#
sqlMap.select: select a.* , b.biz_id as contributorBizId, b.contributor_name as contributorName, b.identity_card as contributorCard, c.biz_id as aidedBizId, c.aided_name as aidedName from of_donate as a LEFT JOIN of_contributor as b on a.contributorId = b.contributor_id LEFT JOIN of_peer as c on a.peerId = c.peer_id WHERE donateId = #donateId#

b.contributor_name LIKE concat('%',#keyWord#,'%') or b.biz_id LIKE concat('%',#keyWord#,'%') or a.feedbacker LIKE concat('%',#keyWord#,'%') or a.type LIKE concat('%',#keyWord#,'%') or c.biz_id LIKE concat('%',#keyWord#,'%') or c.aided_name LIKE concat('%',#keyWord#,'%')
